attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain was once heavily forested.
Why subsidise farmers to lay our countryside fallow, when if we funded them to plant forests we would reduce our CO2 as Trees store CO2?

We would also recreate habitats for our wild life, replenish the substance in our soil and will be investing in a sustainable industry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
